algorithms.ciphers package

Submodules

algorithms.ciphers.caesar module

class algorithms.ciphers.caesar.CaesarCipher(shift: int = 3)[source]

Bases: object

A class for implementing the Caesar cipher, a simple substitution cipher where each letter in the plaintext is shifted a certain number of places down or up the alphabet

Attributes:
sequence:str

A sequence of characters representing the alphabet. Default is the ASCII uppercase characters

shift: int

The number of positions each letter is shifted. Default is 3

decrypt_text(encrypted_text: str) → str[source]

Decrypts a given encrypted text using the Caesar cipher

Parameters:

encrypted_text – str, the encrypted text to be decrypted

Return str:

the decrypted text

encrypt_text(text: str) → str[source]

Encrypts a given text using the Caesar cipher :param text: str, the text to be encrypted :return str: the encrypted text

sequence: ClassVar[str] = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
shift: int = 3

algorithms.ciphers.morse module

class algorithms.ciphers.morse.MorseCipher[source]

Bases: object

A class for Morse Code encryption and decryption Class Attribute morse_code ClassVar[dict[str,str]]: Morse code dictionary

decrypt(encrypted_text: str) → str[source]

Decrypts the given Morse code to obtain the original text :param encrypted_text: str the encrypted text in Morse code :return str: the decrypted original text :raises ValueError: if a character in the text is not present in the reversed Morse code dictionary

encrypt(text: str) → str[source]

Encrypts the given text using Morse code. :param text: str the text to be encrypted :return str: the encrypted text represented in Morse code :raises ValueError: if a character in the input is not in Morse code dictionary

algorithms.ciphers.vigenere module

class algorithms.ciphers.vigenere.VigenereCipher(key: str = 'KEY', vigenere_generator: ~algorithms.ciphers.vigenere._VigenereGenerator = <algorithms.ciphers.vigenere._VigenereSquareGenerator object>)[source]

Bases: object

A class for Vigenere Cipher encryption and decryption

Attributes:
key: str

A key used for encryption and decryption. It determines the row in the Vigenere square to use for each character

vigenere_generator: _VigenereGenerator

An instance of the Vigenere square generator

decrypt(encrypted_text: str) → str[source]

Decrypts the given encrypted text using the Vigenere cipher and provided key :param encrypted_text: str text to be decrypted :return str: the decrypted text

encrypt(text: str) → str[source]

Encrypts the given text using the Vigenere cipher and provided key :param text: str text to be encrypted :return str: the encrypted text

key: str = 'KEY'
